page.title: 06Adults' Leisure Survey
page.content: We wrote a questionaire for all the parents in the school asking about what they do in their spare time.There was section on shopping and we worked out that 15% of adults use the local shops for their main shop,but 80% use them for convenience(when they ran out of things).56% use Hemel Hempstead for shopping,19% use Watford and 34% use Berkhamsted. There were many questions about sport. 64% of adults use the Dacorum Sports Centre.53% swim,15%play badminton,4% play squash,3% do gymnastics and 1% weight lifting. 36% spectate at sports. These spare time activities were mentioned:gardening 72%,dancing 15%, cinema 15%,D.I.Y.56%,library 41%, watching television 80%.
